node.title: Protester falls and is stepped on | June 1st
node.emailMessage: To the [City Council],%0D%0A My name is [FIRSTNAME LASTNAME] and I am a resident at [Address]. I am writing to express my concern regarding recent instances of police brutality in [municipality] outlined herein, as well as to express my support for community-based law enforcement and reallocation of funds toward programs that will build a thriving community in [municipality], rather than further dividing it by continuing to support the police state. As you are surely aware, protests against police brutality and institutionalized racism within our justice system sparked by the murder of George Floyd have been taking place in every state across the country. In almost every instance, the protesters have been peaceful and respectful, yet firm in their convictions. Unfortunately, in many cases—including some here in [municipality]—the protests have turned violent at the hands of the police and the National Guard. For the first time in the history of our nation, these illegal and unconstitutional acts of brutality are being caught on video, meaning that perpetrators may finally be held to account. %0D%0A %0D%0A [SITUATIONAL PARAGRAPHS] %0D%0A%0D As a citizen of [municipality], I have become afraid of the men and women who have sworn to protect and serve [municipality]. Though some police officers undoubtedly act in good faith, every single officer is a willing participant in a system designed to target, entrap, and brutalize minority members of our community. The only option to ensure that citizens of [municipality] can trust law enforcement mechanisms going forward is to defund the police and reinvest that money into programs that result in people getting the help they deserve after calling 9-1-1, rather than a bullet through their torso, a stun gun to their back, or chemical weapons in their eyes. The world is watching—and I hope I can count on you to be on the right side of history. If you would like to discuss this matter further, please contact me at [email] or by phone at [555-555- 5555]. %0D%0A Sincerely, [FIRSTNAME LASTNAME]
